<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Whitecape](/Feats.aspx?ID=4005) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Vanara" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=368" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 55

</column>

---

You're shorter and wider than many vanaras of your heritage, and the hair on your shoulders and your head is particularly thick and luxurious, like a majestic cape. This hair grows back supernaturally quickly if shorn. You gain the [Steady Balance](/Feats.aspx?ID=845) skill feat, even if you aren't trained in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1), and you can Step into difficult terrain caused by uneven ground.

**Special** You can take this feat only at 1st level, and you can't retrain out of or into this feat.
name: Whitecape
